grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 陶芸【トウゲイ】ceramic art, ceramics
陶器【トウキ】porcelain (esp. soft-paste porcelain), china, chinaware, earthenware, pottery, ceramics, crockery
作陶【サクトウ】porcelain making, ceramics making, pottery making
kun reading compounds: 須恵器【すえき】Sue ware (type of unglazed pottery made from the middle of the Kofun era through the Heian era)
